info.name: No Cheese No Coin
info.attribution:
An original game by Stephen Rafferty available under CC BY-SA-NC 4.0. Adapted for use on virtualtabletop.io by LawDawg96.

Noto Sans font by Google available under Open Font License, Version 1.1 from https://fonts.google.com/noto/specimen/Noto+Sans.

To support the creator by purchasing a physical copy of the game, go to https://www.thegamecrafter.com/games/no-cheese-no-coin
info.description: Collect coin and cheese cards. Play cheese card to use its special powers. Play until deck is depleted or 10 minute timer expires. Player with most coin cards at end wins.

fields.text: This will recall and reshuffle all cards.  Are you sure?

americanLabel.text: Click pile label for options then click button.

fields.text: This will swap all player hands with the player to your left. Are you sure?
This will move coin cards to the seat area so you can see who had the most. If there is a tie, press the Sudden Death button to set up the playoff round. Are you sure?
This will recall and shuffle all cards, reset the board, and choose a random starting player. Are you sure?

oops.text: Oops. I made a mistake. Close action buttons.

fields.text: After you have discarded 5 different kinds of cheese, this will take one coin card from every player that has a coin card. Are you sure?
